sentences: Meie on kohtunud juba mitu korda.
context: The word 'kohtunud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'kohtuma', which means to meet or encounter. It's commonly used to indicate that someone has already had an encounter or meeting with another person or people. The word can be translated to English as 'met' (simple past) or 'have met' (present perfect).
